sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'United World Colleges', href: 'https://www.tj.uwc.org/', description: 'Group of international schools that aims to make education a force to unite peoples, nations, and cultures for peace and a sustainable future.', notes: 'English required', imageAlt: 'United World Colleges', imageSrc: require('../images/UWCLogo.jpeg'), }, { id: 2, name: 'UCA Graduate Summer School', href: 'https://ucentralasia.org/schools/school-of-professional-and-continuing-education/continuing-education-programme/spce-tajikistan', description: 'Take summer classes at the presigious UCA Graduate school and learn from the best professors in the country.', notes: 'High school seniors', imageAlt: 'UCA Graduate Summer School', imageSrc: require('../images/randomDude.png'), }, // More products... ] const HomeScreen = () => { return ( <>

Opportunities

{products.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.description}

{product.notes}

))}
) } export default HomeScreen
